name: PuzzleGamePrototype
description:
This is a simple puzzle game i made, it only has 2 levels, i added other features aside from the original ones, the levels are from epic games infinity blade game i just added some revisions.

use all 3 characters to activate switchers to open doors, some switches only need to be activated once some needs to be actively stepped on by a character to stay active and to open doors and some doors and platforms activate once and some require multiple switches that are actively active to stay open, try to reach the final part of each level.

this is just uploaded as part of my portfolio.

character models and animations are from Mixamo.

Music Used:
Music by Zen_Man from Pixabay

Music by Alfred_Grupstra from Pixabay

Music by GeriArt from Pixabay
